gloss: a set of related records (either written or electronic) kept together
a set of related records (either written or electronic) kept together
establish as the highest level or best performance
sound recording consisting of a disk with a continuous groove; used to reproduce music by rotating while a phonograph needle tracks in the groove

a depository containing historical records and documents / a set of related records (either written or electronic) kept together / anything (such as a document or a phonograph record or a photograph) providing permanent evidence of or information about past events
a finish in first place (as in a race) / establish as the highest level or best performance / the best record in the whole world
